title: Giro d’Italia Hopefuls Eye Golden Opportunity in Race without Pogačar: ‘He’s in a League of His Own’
content:
'It can be interesting for the race without such a dominant rider': GC contenders forecast a wild and wide-open race in absence of peloton pulverizer Pogačar.

Read the full article at Giro d’Italia Hopefuls Eye Golden Opportunity in Race without Pogačar: ‘He’s in a League of His Own’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
